change-password.question: How do I change my password?
change-password.answer:
To change your password:
1. Go to Security page
2. Click on Password section
3. Enter your current password
4. Enter your new password (make it strong!)
5. Confirm new password
6. Save changes

Use a strong password with uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.

enable-2fa.question: What is 2FA and how do I enable it?
enable-2fa.answer:
Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) adds an extra security layer to your account.

Important: You must add and verify a contact method before 2FA can be enabled:
1. Go to Security page â†’ Verification & 2FA tab
2. In the "Verification Methods" section, add your email address or phone number and complete verification
3. Once a method is verified, scroll up to the "Two-Factor Authentication" section
4. Toggle 2FA on and choose your authentication method (Email or SMS)
5. Click Save

With 2FA enabled, you'll need to enter a verification code sent to your verified email or phone when logging in from a new or untrusted device.

trust-device.question: How do I trust a device?
trust-device.answer:
To skip 2FA on a trusted device:
1. Make sure 2FA is enabled in Security â†’ Verification & 2FA tab
2. On the same page, scroll down to the "Trust This Device" section (this section only appears when 2FA is enabled)
3. Click "Trust This Device"

The device will be permanently trusted and won't require 2FA codes on future logins. You can manage and revoke trusted devices in the "Trusted Devices" section just below it on the same page.

manage-devices.question: How do I manage my trusted devices?
manage-devices.answer:
Trusted device management is part of the Verification & 2FA tab â€” there is no separate Devices tab:
1. Go to Security page â†’ Verification & 2FA tab
2. Scroll down to the "Trusted Devices" section (only visible when 2FA is enabled)
3. View all your trusted devices listed there
4. Click "Revoke" next to any device to remove its trusted status
5. To trust your current device, use the "Trust This Device" section just above the list

forgot-password.question: What do I do if I forgot my password?
forgot-password.answer:
If you forgot your password:
1. On the login screen, click "Forgot Password?"
2. Enter your email address
3. Check your email for a password reset link
4. Click the link and create a new password
5. Log in with your new password

If you don't receive an email, check your spam folder or contact support.

payment-method.question: How do I add a payment method?
payment-method.answer:
To add a payment method:
1. Go to Billing & Subscriptions page
2. Click on "Payment Methods"
3. Click "Add Payment Method"
4. Enter your card details:
   â€¢ Card number
   â€¢ Expiration date
   â€¢ CVV
   â€¢ Billing address
5. Click Save

Your payment information is securely encrypted.

update-payment.question: How do I update my payment method?
update-payment.answer:
To update a payment method:
1. Go to Billing & Subscriptions â†’ Payment Methods
2. Click on the payment method you want to update
3. Edit the information
4. Save changes

You can add multiple payment methods and set a default one.

remove-payment.question: How do I remove a payment method?
remove-payment.answer:
To remove a payment method:
1. Go to Billing & Subscriptions â†’ Payment Methods
2. Find the payment method to remove
3. Click "Delete" or "Remove"
4. Confirm deletion

Note: You must have at least one valid payment method on file to maintain an active subscription.

subscription-plans.question: What subscription plans are available?
subscription-plans.answer:
We offer several subscription tiers with different features:
â€¢ Free: Basic features and limited daily chat
â€¢ Monthly: Unlimited chat and premium features (renews monthly)
â€¢ Annual: Unlimited chat and premium features (renews yearly, better value)

Go to Billing & Subscriptions â†’ Subscriptions to see detailed plan comparison and pricing.

change-subscription.question: Can I change my subscription plan?
change-subscription.answer:
Yes! You can:
1. Go to Billing & Subscriptions â†’ Subscriptions
2. Select a different plan
3. Confirm the change
4. Your billing will be adjusted accordingly

You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime. Changes take effect immediately.

cancel-subscription.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel-subscription.answer:
To cancel your subscription:
1. Go to Billing & Subscriptions â†’ Subscriptions
2. Find your active subscription card
3. Click the "ðŸ“‹ Switch Plan or Cancel" button on the right side of the card
4. The card will expand â€” scroll down to the "Or Cancel Subscription" section at the bottom
5. Click the red "âœ• Cancel Subscription" button

Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period, then stop. You'll keep your account and all your data. To reactivate later, return to Billing & Subscriptions â†’ Subscriptions and choose a plan.

view-invoices.question: How do I view my invoices?
view-invoices.answer:
To view your billing history:
1. Go to Billing & Subscriptions â†’ Invoices
2. You'll see a list of all past and current invoices
3. Click any invoice to view details
4. You can download invoices for your records

billing-problem.question: What if my payment failed?
billing-problem.answer:
If a payment fails:
1. Check your payment method is valid and not expired
2. Go to Billing & Subscriptions â†’ Payment Methods
3. Update or add a new payment method
4. Try again
5. If the problem persists, contact support

Your subscription may be paused until payment is successful.

data-privacy-policy.question: How is my data protected?
data-privacy-policy.answer:
We take data security seriously:
â€¢ All personal information is encrypted
â€¢ We use secure SSL/TLS connections
â€¢ Your data is never shared with third parties
â€¢ Regular security audits and updates
â€¢ Compliance with privacy regulations

See our Privacy Policy for complete details.

delete-account.question: How do I delete my account?
delete-account.answer:
To delete your account:
1. Go to Settings page
2. Find "Delete Account" section
3. Click "Request Account Deletion"
4. Confirm your request
5. Your account and data will be securely deleted

This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

data-export.question: Can I export my data?
data-export.answer:
Yes, you can download your data:
1. Go to Settings page
2. Find "Download My Data" section
3. Click the "Download" button
4. Your data will be downloaded as a JSON file

The file contains all your personal information, chat history, and account data.

read-terms-privacy.question: How do I read the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy?
read-terms-privacy.answer:
You can access these documents anytime through the Help button:
1. Click the ? (Help) button on any screen

You can read these documents at any time to understand your rights and our policies.

app-compatibility.question: What devices does the app work on?
app-compatibility.answer:
Psychic Chat works on:
â€¢ iOS (iPhone, iPad)
â€¢ Android (phones and tablets)
â€¢ Web browsers (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge)
â€¢ Desktop and mobile devices

Just visit our website or download from your app store.

app-not-loading.question: What if the app won't load?
app-not-loading.answer:
If the app won't load:
1. Check your internet connection
2. Clear your browser cache
3. Close and reopen the app
4. Restart your device
5. Log out and log back in
6. Try in a different browser
7. Uninstall and reinstall the app (as last resort)

If problems persist, contact support.

slow-performance.question: The app is running slowly. What can I do?
slow-performance.answer:
If the app is slow:
1. Check your internet connection (try WiFi)
2. Close other apps running in the background
3. Clear browser cache and cookies
4. Restart your device
5. Update to the latest app version
6. Check available storage space

If still slow, contact support with details about your device.

sync-issues.question: My data isn't syncing across devices. What do I do?
sync-issues.answer:
If data isn't syncing:
1. Make sure you're logged into the same account on all devices
2. Check internet connection on all devices
3. Log out and log back in
4. Force app refresh or reload page
5. Restart devices
6. Update the app to latest version

Contact support if the issue continues.

contact-support.question: How do I contact support?
contact-support.answer:
If you need help:
1. Use the Help Chat (? button) in the app for quick answers
2. Check this FAQ document
3. Email support at: support@starshippsychics.com
4. Visit our website for more resources

Our support team usually responds within 24 hours.

bug-report.question: How do I report a bug?
bug-report.answer:
If you find a bug:
1. Note exactly what happened
2. Include steps to reproduce the issue
3. Share your device type and app version
4. Email support@starshippsychics.com with details
5. Include any error messages you see

Bug reports help us improve the app for everyone!

feature-request.question: Can I suggest a new feature?
feature-request.answer:
Absolutely! We love feature requests:
1. Email support@starshippsychics.com
2. Subject: "Feature Request: [Your idea]"
3. Describe the feature and why it would help
4. Let us know your use case

Great suggestions might be added in future updates!

feedback.question: How can I provide feedback?
feedback.answer:
We'd love to hear from you:
1. Email: info@starshippsychics.com
2. Subject: "Feedback: [Topic]"
3. Share what you love and what could improve
4. Be specific with examples

Your feedback helps us create a better app!
